content.15: The prediction mask of the ground truth PERSON regions is quite similar to the ground truth, but it appears slightly smoother and less detailed. The boundaries of the PERSON regions are less precise, with some areas being over-segmented and others under-segmented, especially around the arms and shoulders.

content.7: The prediction mask of the ground truth CAR region is significantly different. The prediction is very sparse and incomplete, with many areas of the CAR not being segmented at all. There are also some isolated pixels segmented as CAR in areas where they shouldn't be, especially on the top-left of the scene.
content.15: The prediction mask is quite different from the ground truth PERSON region. The prediction seems to have missed a significant portion of the person, especially on the right side, while also over-segmenting some areas around the person. The boundaries are very irregular and imprecise.

content.12: The prediction mask of the ground truth DOG region is quite rough, with a more irregular shape. The head of the dog is significantly under-segmented, while the body is over-segmented, resulting in a less defined overall shape.
content.17: The prediction mask of the ground truth SHEEP region is quite rough and noisy, with several disconnected components within the region and some areas missing, especially on the head and the back. The overall shape is less defined and more fragmented compared to the ground truth.
